title: Building the Ultimate Xbox 360
description: The Microsoft Xbox 360 was THE game console but how does it handle the ultimate treatment? Calibur11 Battlefield Vault for Xbox 360 on Amazon:  Xbox 360 HD DVD Player on Amazon:  500GB Internal Xbox 360 Hard Drive on Amazon:  Nyko Intercooler for Xbox 360 Slim on Amazon:  Nyko Charge Base for Xbox controller on Amazon:   By using our Amazon affiliate links, you help to support the channel as we may receive compensation for purchases through those links.  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
